group_1.narration: It has been two days since the assault@that occurred during the speech@in support of the mayoral election in Kamihama,@and new allegations have been uncovered@from the questioning of the suspect.
An investigation is currently underway@into gang members believed to be related to the suspect,@and there are concerns that this could have@an impact on the election campaign.

group_1.textCenter: (I had a painful feeling that there would be@an investigation...)

group_1.textRight: Mm, morning. A rare sight to see the sisters@going to school together.

group_1.textLeft: It's because I haven't attended enough days.

group_1.textRight: I see, so it's out of your control.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, did you see the election news?@The situation is looking grim...

group_1.textRight: Mm... I was shocked myself, but I don't think it's@enough to worry about.
It was explained that he was trying to help us.
The gang member on the news was from@an old biker gang...

group_1.textLeft: But even though it was his fault for having@a dark past, with everyone watching this...

group_1.textRight: Even now, we still overcome adversity@because of our past.
I'm positive we will be fine this time as well.
At a time like this, we have to be positive, Sis.
There's lots of weird rumors going around,@so we can't let ourselves be fooled.

group_1.textLeft: People have been saying it was the west's fault@that someone in the Union died...

group_1.textRight: That story? I heard it from Himika.
That Yachiyo and her group being late@was them offering Ryou's life...

group_1.textLeft: Right, that story.@Nagitan heard it too then, huh...?

group_1.textRight: There is no point in discussing it.
Without a single shred of factual information@to look into, it is nothing but a baseless rumor.
Instead of running aimlessly in every direction,@it would be better to prepare to fight.

group_1.textLeft: Based on the information we got from@Kamihama Prison, we should be able to take action.
